ygData.subject: Re: Level 20 - WTG?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the standard solo power-gamer spot is the aviak guards in lake rathe.  My bard went there from 20-23, real fast.  Around 22nd you can start to hold a 2
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the standard solo power-gamer spot is the aviak guards in
lake rathe. My bard went there from 20-23, real fast. Around 22nd
you can start to hold a 2 spawn island, 23rd I could hold the 3 spawn
tower. I did this with banded armor and instruments so I know
anyone can do it.



>
> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
> I also just hit 20 and decided to give Lake Rathe a try. Mind you I have not
> actually hunted anything yet, but from a brief swim around the lake it
> seemed as though there would be plenty to hunt and hopefully I will find
> some pickup groups.
>
> Berwyn
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 12:07 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] Level 20 - WTG?
>
>
> > From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> >

> >
> > As a level 20 bard, where is a good place to go? I know
> > all about the level chart on AllaKazam's page, but I've
> > found it to be seriously flawed so I don't follow it.
> >
> > Thanks!
> >
> > PS: Maybe we could come up with a list or chart for
> > bards between all of us..
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
